1.text: Play the game with at least 1 person.

2.text: Assign 1 player to be the dealer.

3.text: Arrange 12 cards face-up on a flat surface in a 4-by-3 grid.

4.text: Memorize the different types of SET cards.

5.text: Search for a set in the card grid.

6.text: Say “set” before the other players and point out the cards.

7.text: Pause gameplay and let the other players confirm your set.

8.text: Collect the 3 winning cards and gain 1 point for the set.

9.text: Replace the missing cards in the grid with 3 new ones.

10.text: Add 3 extra cards to the grid if you can’t find a set in a game.

11.text: Identify and collect sets of 3 cards as you spot them.

12.text: Continue gameplay until there are no cards or sets left in the deck.

13.text: Count the number of sets each player has to declare a winner.
